text: Vanity Fair is a monthly magazine of popular culture, fashion, and current affairs published by Cond√© Nast in the United States. The first version of Vanity Fair was published from 1913 to 1936. It was revived in 1983 and currently includes five international editions of the magazine. As of 2018, the Editor-in-Chief is Radhika Jones. ==References== Category:American monthly magazines
title: Vanity Fair (magazine)
